sect1.title: Updating Bugzilla
sect1.para: When a new package is released by its maintainers, we mark this in Bugzilla. You don't need to update the book right after a package is released, but at least announce it.

listitem.para: Go to Bugzilla's query page at
Type the name of the package into the summary field and choose all of the statuses to ensure that the package version tracking bug will be found.
Update the Summary field to reflect the new available version.
Select the Reopen bug radio button.
